website_summaries.verdict: These durable, easy-to-clean straws will have you turning your back on disposable straws for good.
pros: 8-piece set includes 4 bent and 4 straight straws
Comes with easy to use cleaning tools
Available in a variety of metallic colors
cons: Straws quickly absorb the temperature of your drink, be cautious with hot beverages

customer_reviews.title: v good sip suc
customer_reviews.text: you know that feeling, when you get an iced coffee, and like... it comes in a plastic container...and there's also like a plastic lid... and you're like fine whatever who cares about plastic... but then the barista has the AUDACITY to give you a PLASTIC straw and that's just, u know, the final straw (pun NOT INTENDED)... because you care about turtles, man. So then you whip out one of these bad boiz and BOOM you're sip sucking your $5 coofefefefe and there are NO dead turtles in ur subconscious. mmmmmm now that's some easy slurpin
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Leave a metallic taste! I refuse to use them ...
customer_reviews.text: Leave a metallic taste! I refuse to use them after that. There is definitely some coating leaching into the drink! Not healthy. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for cold drinks
customer_reviews.text: These are so much better than the heavy duty plastic straws. They clean up like a dream, do not hold the taste of your drink and best of all, because they are stainless steel, they conduct the cold of your ice. Having used the semi permanent plastic straws for years, these were an amazing upgrade. I actually like the bent ones better than the straight, however, the straight ones are the perfect size for the tall spout top water bottles so I was able to replace their plastic straw with the straight stainless steel one.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret G. Winstanley

customer_reviews.title: Even water tastes like metal
customer_reviews.text: I hate leaving bad reviews, but I want people to consider other options such as glass or bamboo straws too. I purchased these and was really excited until I used a straw only to discover it makes everything I tried drinking taste like metal. I got these to stop using plastic straws but I think I will now give bamboo ones a try. Your batch might be just fine, but I just don't feel comfortable drinking out of this hoping it's just an adjustment period.
customer_reviews.author: Karina321

customer_reviews.title: Buy these, you'll LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: I do love these straws! They are plenty long enough for any of my tumblers. Both 20 oz and 30 oz. If I decided to get a 40 oz, it would fit that too. The bent straws are at a perfect angle. The straight straws are great too. I most love how the liquid is cold all the way to my mouth, and no nasty plastic taste or feeling. Also no dish detergent taste or smell. Don't hesitate to get these.
customer_reviews.author: Bekka

customer_reviews.title: Not stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: WARNING POSSIBLY FAKE: advertised as stainless steel on amazon but package reads as “stainless” made in China. They do not have the weight or feel of stainless steel. Throwing them out. Not sure what they are made of.
customer_reviews.author: jlw

customer_reviews.title: While the idea sounds great for your stainless travel mug
customer_reviews.text: While the idea sounds great for your stainless travel mug, its not so great when you get them. The inside of the edges are sharp enough to cut your lip or tongue on. The unyielding meter tubing is probably not something you want kids using, especially in the car.
customer_reviews.author: NAK

customer_reviews.title: Metallic Taste
customer_reviews.text: These straws make any drink taste oddly metallic. I returned them because I couldn’t stand the taste. The straws were sturdy but the cleaners should have been longer to clean the whole straw.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Saffle

customer_reviews.title: So not buy horrible quality and sharp on the ends.
customer_reviews.text: Not good quality. Looks great and came fast. The straw is very sharp on the top edges. It can cut someone's mouth and I'm so glad I didn't give it to anyone else before I used one. Not worth purchasing at all!
customer_reviews.author: Jae

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your drinks tasting cold and fresh!
customer_reviews.text: Love drinking from stainless steel flasks and the straws keep the water nice and cold all the way up! The curved option straw is great for larger flasks so the straw doesn't fall into the flask. The scrub brushes are great.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: These straws are way too big to use for a ...
customer_reviews.text: These straws are way too big to use for a normal glass. Wanted to return them immediately and was unable too due to the return policy.
customer_reviews.author: cmshipman

customer_reviews.title: Great Straws, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I personally would like them better if they were slightly shorter, but if you're using them with a tall cold-cup, they would need to be this long. The inclusion of the cleaning brushes is a good deal, though for most drinks, I think an immediate rinse of the straw with hot, hot water will do the job just fine. It's easy to drink even a slightly thick smoothie through these smooth, polished straws.
customer_reviews.author: CindyTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: The bent four are worthless and I hate them. The straight four are okay
customer_reviews.text: The bent four are worthless and I hate them. The straight four are okay. Don't bite wrong or carelessly or you could chip your teeth. I hear paper straws and maybe wood straws will make a comeback. Steel is okay, but the cleaners and bent ones are rediculous. Also, the aperture is too narrow. If drinking smoothie it clogs really bad and because plastic scraws warp they unclog easier. This staw will take all your sucking power and you still wont get it to dislodge if the smoothie isn't room temperature. Simply put the appature is too small. 2 Stars for good concept and ego friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functional Straw, but I Don't Love It
customer_reviews.text: I've been using my straws daily for a month now. I typically use them at the office. They work well and I love that I'm not using plastic straws. However, they are not very comfortable. If I have ice in my cup for an iced coffee, obviously the metal works as a conductor and gets super cold, leaving me sipping on icy metal. Also, the experience of having such a hard straw is taking a long time to get used to. I've hit my teeth with it a few times, and the edge is quite sharp on the lip. If I order more, I would try the silicone ones next time.
customer_reviews.author: von Rubenstein

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and way too long!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed as they were so flimsy and way too long! They will for sure be very hot as they are so flimsy when used in coffee. I guess being made in China is something I should have noticed.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Henningsen

customer_reviews.title: Love the price, but gives drinks a funny taste
customer_reviews.text: I really love how many straws came in this order, however I find myself not favoring these straws due to a funny taste that follows when drinking with them. Not sure if it’s the chemicals from the metal, or what.. but not what I want to worry about while sipping my homemade iced coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Loved my stainless steel straws
customer_reviews.text: Loved my stainless steel straws! Always feel clean! Bought them for me and my family and my niece was super excited to use them and she was really proud to contribute in reducing waste! I wish it would have a bag so I could carry them everywere, need a ziplock or something... Thank you thank you thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Berenice Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I think of that
customer_reviews.text: Great straws and very sturdy. I would highly recommend. I like that fact that you can reuse and not depend on the plastic disposable counterparts. I hope that these straws will continue to thrive and not become obsolete as so many other past items that have were once dependable but were taken off the market because they were causing a downfall in sales for cheaper (and cheaply made) items that needed to be constantly replaced. Plastic straws are still good for the restaurants, social occasions, etc. that would require disposal items, but if you are looking for your own personal straw/s that (so far to date) you won't have to replace, look no farther.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dependability

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase this Item!
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this item! I received the package with nothing in it. Now I am out the $14 (including shipping). DON'T PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Sawyer III

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing. The straws are significantly thinner than the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. The straws are significantly thinner than the plastic ones, not much bigger in diameter than cocktail straws. Also an unwieldy length, though the ad cited the length.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: smooth edges, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as large of diameter as I was hoping, but this size was a large as I could find for my double wall tumbler. Granted it is 5 or 6 years old, so the straw sizes were less consistent between manufacturers. Love that the stainless can not melt or be bent in a hot car. The straw cleaner is great - and it comes with 2 so when one gets all mushed (as all bottle and straw cleaners do over time) I will have another one. I would recommend to anyone looking for a replacement for old straws or those wanting to have less plastic in the environment
customer_reviews.author: GoldenGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great straws if you need them
customer_reviews.text: We got these for my wife after she was diagnosed with Bell’s Palsey and couldn’t really move the right side of her mouth, making drinking from a cup very difficult. She used these for everything and really seemed to enjoy them, considering the circumstances. Now that she’s mostly recovered, she is still using them, just not as much as before. They seem very durable and I have very little concern of them getting bent or anything like that. It comes with a little brush that you can thread through the straw to help clean it. It works, but is a bit cumbersome. But, for a pack of straws, this was well worth it, at least for us.
customer_reviews.author: overlordspock

customer_reviews.title: Like I said
customer_reviews.text: The quality on this item seems to be just ok. I got these today and upon opening I noticed one of the straight straws had what seems to be an accidental cut in the metal straw making it unusable, as seen in the photo. All other straws were okay and I will use them. Also, something I didn’t think of when purchasing these is they don’t have a stopper on the straw, so they will fall out of your tumbler or lid if tipped. Like I said, they’re just ok in my opinion, the quality is a bit disappointing but I will still use them and I’m sure they’ll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: K P

customer_reviews.title: Easy and carefree
customer_reviews.text: I love reusable straws. They're convenient and environmentally friendly. I enjoy the fact that they are metal because it helps with my straw biting habit and they last longer. I purchased the 10" straws and they are quite long. I have a few tall cups but not enough to justify buying the longer straws. I also enjoy that there are cleaning tools for the straws and it all comes with a zip lock storage bag. I will keep and enjoy these but I will also be purchasing the shorter ones.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Soooooo skinny!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I'm usually good at reading the product specs...but I totally screwed the pooch on this one. ***They say not for smoothies or shakes...and they mean it!*** These straws are MUCH smaller than a "normal" restaurant straw. The pic shows my usual plastic straw and one of these metal straws with my morning smoothie. I attempted to drink my smoothie with the metal straw. It's a definite NO GO! So, are these straws good? I guess...but even for water, the straw feels weird in your mouth because it's so skinny. They are metal, durable, and come with cleaning brushes and a pouch...but I would pass on them.
customer_reviews.author: John E.

customer_reviews.title: Good step to get rid of plastic but hard to clean.
customer_reviews.text: . A nice way to get away from plastic straws. I bought some and divided them up Sstocking stuffer gifts. Everyone felt it was a useful gift, however, they are narrow enough not to be difficult to clean despite the enclosure of two brushes in each pack. Not sure they get clean when you have a drink that might stick to the inside like a milk shake. I'd feel more confident of their cloning us if they were wider and diameter.
customer_reviews.author: Ceegie

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love them
customer_reviews.text: I run an environmentally conscious household. We attempt to not buy anything that cannot be recycled and shy away from anything that has to be thrown away. We all know (or should know) that plastic straws are not only unable to be recycled, but they destroy the environment in other ways and particularly with wildlife. Now off my pedestal. These straws just don't feel right to the mouth and could be hazardous to your teeth if you're not paying attention while inserting into the mouth. Paper straws are now back and more substantial than in years passed. I think that will be my new direction.
customer_reviews.author: Magic

customer_reviews.title: Great straws that don't tarnish!
customer_reviews.text: I was buying plastic straws but they kept getting warped in the dishwasher after a bunch of uses. Not so warped that I couldn't use them, but I decided metal straws were probably better and more durable. I like how some of them are curved. Only complaint is that they were thicker - they slip through my utensils tray in my dishwasher which gets annoying. But I can live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carli

customer_reviews.title: I Use Them Whenever I Need to Drink
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and durable. I prefer the ones that have a slight angle to them. Wish they came with silicone tips as the metal can get really cold or very hot depending on what you're drinking and hurt sensitive teeth. But I probably shouldn't be drinking coffee with a straw! I've bought more than one set and it's nice not wasting paper/plastic or making extra trash. Easy to use and it's hard to spill a drink all over yourself with a straw. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lí

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: I love straws, they make drinking feel fun and special and with these I feel no shame. I can use these as many times as I want without harming the environment. Easy to travel with, easy to clean and there's absolutely no change in taste. Of course, it does feel a little weird if it's your first time using metal straws but after a while you get very used to them! Honestly, they're great not just because you're helping the world but because they don't get soggy like paper and edible straws, they don't bend and accidentally break like plastic straws and they won't cut your mouth like plastic straws. They are literally perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Great for cold drinks and tall glasses.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Will never have to use another plastic straw from our coffee house again (for iced drinks of course, not good for hot beverages). Kids love them too, but they are heavy and tall which means they will tip low-ball plastic cups, as our youngest found out the hard way! Otherwise, great in high cocktail glasses and other cold take out beverages. They get great comments from our friends and family - pretty sure we should buy stock in the manufacturer as I know we've influenced lots of sales!!
customer_reviews.author: PeoplesHero

customer_reviews.title: Much bigger than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Fine straws. Exactly as described. Should have measured before ordering, but they are ridiculously long. They’re seemingly made to replace straws in your big gulp from the neighborhood 7/11. Even in a 16oz glass they comically flop around. Don’t even think about using them in a highball glass. They truly are as described, just thought they would be more similar to normal sized straws. Actually cut one in half for lowball glasses and that works well. Recommend: measure your glasses and current straws before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: plaidflamingo

customer_reviews.title: Better choice than disposable!
customer_reviews.text: These stainless steel straws are a nice substitution for disposable straws and those nasty plastic ones that come in tumblers and drink mugs. The cleaning tools were a great add to the set. They are narrower than the straws that come with my various drink containers, so they do spin around a lot. That's not too much of a problem for plastic cups but on my stainless containers it's pretty noise. They don't have the little nub to keep the straw from coming out the hole, having that would make these perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Chaos

customer_reviews.title: Nice long, reusable straws
customer_reviews.text: I really like these straws! I'm trying to be a lot more eco-friendly with more and more reusable products, so these were great. They are the perfect length for a large tumbler (like a Yeti), but not so much for regular drinking glasses, which was more what I wanted them for. I'm so glad they came with cleaning brushes as well! These things can be tricky to clean and the cleaning brush I have for my water bottle straws is just a bit too wide for these. I would strongly recommend these if you're looking for straws for larger cups!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Having to fight off people stealing it.
customer_reviews.text: I decided to upgrade to these metal straws a while back and bought this pack figuring I'd have plenty of spares. One for work, one for home, one for the wife, one for the wife's friend... wait... one for my boss... hold on now... one for another friend, OKAY! That's IT! I'm down to one straight straw and one curved straw and I'm hiding those to make sure no one else ends up with them. The two I've been able to keep using myself have held up perfectly with zero damage and cleans up to looking brand new even after constant use for several months.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These straws were not at all as I expected. They were wayyyyyyyy too long for the average glass... Did not like them in any way,,,
customer_reviews.author: Jeane S.Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these straws!!
customer_reviews.text: These straws are great and I wish I'd found them a long time ago. Not only are they indestructible, easy to clean, and reusable, they save immensely on the environment!!! Everyone should buy these! You'd never have to buy straws again. I especially like the angled ones because my husband drinks a lot of fluids in the night, so I fill his thermos with ice water before bed, put in the straw, and he's set til morning. No spilling on himself or fumbling around for the opening in the lid!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: They are useful!
customer_reviews.text: I've had surgery and can't use my arms very much. (Just limited mobility, can't lift much). These have been so useful in my water bottles/cups/soup. I mean, super useful. The metal helps them not get soggy, and I can't chew them like I would compulsively do with the plastic kind. lol. They are easy to clean! I just take the little bristle thingy and soap, let water run over them and they're ready to go. It's great. :) Also, save the sea turtles.
customer_reviews.author: Homeboy Gotcha

customer_reviews.title: Ditch Plastic Straws - These are GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I ditched plastic straws some time ago. These are great!!! They come with a cleaning brush to make cleaning easy for these. They come in bent as well as straight, so whatever your preference, you're good. I make shakes and smoothies at home for us and the kids and these are perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Hough

customer_reviews.title: A little tricky to clean
customer_reviews.text: It comes with a little pipe cleaner, but it is kind of a hassle to do every time you want a straw. But, I mean, you have to wash them every time you use them. What you end up with is a pile of straws that need washed because you think to yourself, "oh, I'll just use another one and wash the two later." Then two turns into three, and three turns into five, and then you feel lost and alone.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Awesome straws
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a good alternative to plastic straws and I’m honestly not a fan of paper straws. These are perfect to throw in my purse to take out or to use at home. They’re really long, longer than I expected, but that makes them perfect even for large drinks. The included brushes work perfectly to clean them. I’m really happy with these straws and they were a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy C.

customer_reviews.title: We will NOT buy metal straws again
customer_reviews.text: Save the planet, avoid plastic straws, we get that, however, we did not stick we these metal straws. Maybe it was our imagination, but we could taste a metallic type taste when sipping our favorite soft drink through these. Plus, if you like biting your straw, forget that here. Further, these are just a pain to clean. We will go with paper. Sorry, we would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: My husband got mad at me because when we go to restaurants I ask for straws. I don't like drinking from the cup, and he always tells me that thanks to me a turtle is going to die. Being the big animal lover that I am, he told me to get stainless steel straws so I found these and so far they are great. Variety of sizes for different cups. This set is to keep at home, I did purchase some travel stainless steel straws that shrink so they can come with me to the restaurants.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I have several insulated drinking cups and bottles. After seeing the recent pictures of the huge trash mess in the Pacific as well as recognizing how bad plastic trash is, I decided that instead of carrying bottled water on my commute and at work, I’d break out my collection. I needed straws because it’s very difficult to drink from lid of the cups, especially while I’m driving. Stainless steel seemed a safer choice than glass, especially for on the road, and I liked this set because it had straight straws and bent straws, plus cleaning brushes. It’s also a plus that these are dishwasher safe. Item arrived as promised. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bartleby75

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These straws are one small step among many needed to curtail my plastic use. Now I always have a few of these straws in my glovebox, in my backpack, on hand (along with a reusable container). I like that they also come with two (2) perfectly sized cleaners. They seem to fit medium to large containers just right. The plastic problem is huge. We won't likely solve the problem in this lifetime, but even small efforts can add up. Note: It would be even better if these straws didn't ship in a plastic ziplock.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Too long
customer_reviews.text: I don't recall seeing the length given in description; it may have been and I didn't think it mattered. But these straws are really too long for an average glass or cup and my husband, who likes straws, won't use these. I was hoping to help save the environment in our small way, but now I would like to find another use for these sturdy steel straws.
customer_reviews.author: Bonniej

customer_reviews.title: I use these all the time.
customer_reviews.text: I go to Dunkin Donuts pretty often and have felt guilty about all the straws I use. So I purchased these and I'm really happy I did. I use them at home all the time too. I prefer the straight ones to the curved ones. I just find them easier to use. But they came with a handy thin, cleaning brush and I just most often pop them in the dish washer. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: William Baczek

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel Straws Are The Way To Go
customer_reviews.text: These are becoming more and more popular. We've ordered similar straws in the past and, as with these, they work great. They can be a bit jarring on the teeth, however, if you're not being careful. We later purchased stainless steel straws that had silicone tips, which we like much better, so maybe consider looking into those. But these are fine. No real complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Dave P

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: These straws are perfect! I was a bit hesitant due to some reviews mentioning a metallic tast, but that hasn't happened with these straws... The only time I have had that problems was with a previous set and lemonade (probably due to the acidity of the lemon and the steel). Super easy to clean, just wish the brush was about an inch longer to get all the way through the straw from one side. I am now known as the straw girl among my friends... These are amazing and I definitely would recommend them to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Zada

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to these. They did arrive as expected and are good solid quality. But I will be recycling them because they are dangerous! If you're walking and sipping and you trip, you'd cut your throat open from inside your mouth! The ends are sharp! I'm going to keep one for hulking strawberries, that's how sharp it is.
customer_reviews.author: mozie84

customer_reviews.title: Saving Landfills
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these straws so that I was not contributing to the landfills. I love these straws! They are easy to keep clean & a little brush comes with the set. When you drink anything hot or cold, the straw keeps the same temp & things taste better. There are enough straws for guests & the nice part is that they are forever straws. You will never have to buy another straw again! The price, for what you get & what you save in landfills, is well worth it.....very reasonable!
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Toth

customer_reviews.title: Strong metallic taste ☹️
customer_reviews.text: Washed and dried one of the straws (rinsed thoroughly). I took a sip of water through it and got this strong metallic taste that is lingering. Just brushed my teeth to get rid of it and it's still kind of there. Definitely returning.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, not very practical
customer_reviews.text: I bought these stainless steel straws thinking that i would never have to purchase straws again. The idea is great however beware that you cannot use these straws with glass (plastic only). Now i find myself having to buy plastic cups to use with my stainless steel straws. Second, don't miss your mouth; if you do you could end up with a chipped tooth.
customer_reviews.author: randyman56

customer_reviews.title: A little apprehensive at first but now I keep one in my purse at all times
customer_reviews.text: Because it's stainless steel I was a little worried it would have a metallic taste but it doesn't. They're very easy to clean and comes with its own brush and bag. I've had mine for months and carry one in my purse wherever I go. As more and more companies use paper straws that tend to get soggy rather quickly this is an ideal alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny D

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my husband and I to cut down on our single-use plastic usage. They're a little longer than expected (totally my fault, I didn't conceptualize the length), but they're sturdy and we don't notice any metallic taste to our beverages (we have used them for water, soda, fruit juice, and cold brew so far). They aren't sharp, but being metal they are quite firm, so I would recommend supervision for young children and they might be difficult to use for those with limited mobility or fine motor control.
customer_reviews.author: Larra

customer_reviews.title: A good investment
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these straws to drink coffee from my insulated tumblers. First off, using these are environmentally responsible. Secondly they're pretty convenient. I use them to drink water from insulated bottles when I'm driving, easy peazy. Sipping coffee with these straws keep the lids of the bottles clean. They come with a bag to store all the straws as well as the 2 brushed to clean the inside of the straws.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and eco friendly
customer_reviews.text: I switched to reusable straws and love these. They're long so it's perfect for my tall glasses. I hold it up to the light to make sure the inside is clean. I accidentally broke a reusable, clear plastic straw the other day so i'm glad I have these durable straws now.
customer_reviews.author: Hasmin Wicklund

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to do, but has a few issues.
customer_reviews.text: I got these because they are better for the environment, but they came with a few issues. Some of the edges on the straws are not consistent - they are a bit sharper than the others, and I’ve promptly tossed those since I didn’t want to risk cutting my lip on it. The straws that I haven’t tossed are usable, but come with this odd taste to it. This is my first time using metal straws, so not sure if this is normal, which is the reason I gave this product 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Great straws. Brush should be longer though.
customer_reviews.text: Great straws for shakes or really any beverage that is cold. Haven't tested on a hot beverage... common sense tells me the whole straw would be hot! 4 stars for easy to clean just because you have to feed the brush through both ends because it is not long enough to go through the whole straw.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: These straws work well
customer_reviews.text: Theses straws were bought to use with Yeti Tumblers and other tumblers. The straws are a little thinner diameter than we would prefer, yet they are effective in their purpose. Just don't try to drink drinks with chunks of fruit or anything. The only issue we had with these straws are the length. The straws are fine, yet an added inch or so to the bent straws would have been great. They are a tad short for the larger tumblers. According to my wife, the perfect size is found with the A**** 30oz Tumbler.. (unsure if I should post the brand name)
customer_reviews.author: John&Toni Whisman

customer_reviews.title: Great eco-friendly product. Sleek and modern looking. Comes with a cool pouch.
customer_reviews.text: I love these straws. I didn’t think that I was going to need more than one but I have to share and also I don’t have to clean it right away. The straw is really cool in that it gets really cold when drinking something cold. On a hot summer day it just gives that extra cooling effect. Easy to clean and I haven’t gotten any dings or scratch on there yet so I am overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka

customer_reviews.title: I Prefer metal straws now! 🤩
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure I would like a metal straw but now me and my daughter prefer it. Next I will get us travel ones so we can have them everywhere. It doesn’t change the taste and everything just seems colder/better. If you apprehensive like I was this is such a great price to give it a try. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Silent

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Cons: Tastes like steel Narrow opening If the straw is cold it will stick to your lips. Clinky you have sensitive teeth Pro : The only pro for this product is the price WITH the Amazon coupon! THAT'S IT! I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT! 👎
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Okay so if you want to replace plastic straws try these
customer_reviews.text: During the summers I make my own iced coffees which I take to work. These were perfects for that task, they work well and I dont have to use plastic straws anymore for my iced coffees. The price for the 6 you get is a great deal, plus you get the straw cleaner as well. Great price, less waste
customer_reviews.author: bilbo

customer_reviews.title: Doing my part for Mother Earth!
customer_reviews.text: These are great and now that I've been using them for a month with everything I drink I love them. I keep some in my truck, some at home and when any of the places I eat or drink at gives me a plastic straw I say "no thanks"! I've used them for everything from smoothies to milkshakes with not one problem. Get them and do your part for Mother Earth! They were delivered on time and with everything seen in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Photocop2011

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used these several times since purchasing and arriving last week. I am pleased with the quality and love knowing that I am decreasing my use of plastics and plastic environment waste. For the price you get 8 straws that are easy to clean and very affordable in my opinion. Will be gifting these in the future to my other environmentally conscious friends!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love these reusable straws!
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of purchasing plastic straws for my daily smoothies so decided to invest in these. Plus I had been hearing those stories about how our straws are polluting our oceans, so just trying to do my part! Now if I could get my husband to kick his water bottle habit.... I love these straws! They’re durable and will probably last me forever. I love that they come with brushes because they do need to be cleaned, especially after a fruit smoothie :) Great product! Great price! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: You'll love these straws!
customer_reviews.text: I love these straws! I missed drinking iced tea from a straw, and instead of buying plastic, I bought these ones since I had been wanting to get reusable ones for a while. I was a little concerned because of some negative reviews I saw, but the number and overall rating of the product encouraged me to go for it, and I'm glad I did! The price is amazing, and so is the product! This is one of the very few times when the whole "you get what you pay for" doesn't apply. Plus, the packaging is super cute! They're very easy to clean and the brushes are very sturdy as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy straw for my Hydro Flask
customer_reviews.text: I bought the straws because I always carry a hydro flask of iced water with lemon and could not find the correct length straw to go along with it. The straws, which came with 2 brushes to clean them with, are very useful except for one small problem. The brushes are too short. I have a lemon pit stuck in one straw that I cannot remove and which cannot be used. Other than that, I love them, and am for careful with the pits.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Libbie Chute

customer_reviews.title: ... and keeping clean (air dry) they start to smell like rust.
customer_reviews.text: After about 10-12 uses and thoroughly brushing them and keeping clean (air dry) they start to smell like rust.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous about the order, because I had seen some reviews saying the paint came off the straws when washing and using it. I have not had that experience at all. I went with the stainless steel set of 8, and have had zero issues. There’s also no metal taste, which was another concern of mine. I keep 2 in my truck for when I go out (everywhere by me has gone to the horrible cardboard straws) and the rest are used when I remember to make myself a coffee in the morning. I plan on buying more, and trying out some colors.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good for Travel
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of four straight and four bent (curved) stainless steel drinking straws. This also comes with two handy cleaning brushes and a somewhat flimsy travel pouch. Both sizes / styles of the straws are great and fit a wide variety of cup sizes. I can use them in standard lidded tumblers or larger yetis with lid. No problem. Cleaning the straw is a snap with the brush that comes with it. Great buy for the money. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Reh

customer_reviews.title: Great straws, but the bag is too small
customer_reviews.text: I like these straws a lot. I prefer metal to silicone because they don’t collect dust and fibers. I don’t feel like the have a metallic taste, and they’re easy to clean. I also like the tall size. The only downside to this set is that the little pouch is not quite long enough, so it wouldn’t close all the way. I have a different one I had previously purchased for other straws, so it worked for these longer ones.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Tombaugh

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: These straws work great. I keep one in my office, two in my laptop bag, and the rest at home. I am glad that there are two brushes, so I can clean them at work or at home. I don't find them getting very hot or cold. However, I haven't used them in any hot beverages. I use them mainly when I go out to eat or in a Starbucks frappuccino.
customer_reviews.author: Nalani Ha'o

customer_reviews.title: Great Straws
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of metal straws - they are better for the environment and look cute! It's great that they came with cleaning brushes too! I squirt some soap onto the brush and run hot water through it while using the brush. I also like that they offered straight and bent straws. Great price for the item, too!
customer_reviews.author: M. Ducreaux

customer_reviews.title: great product and would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I use these almost everyday and they're great! I love the brush cleaner that comes with it because I wouldn't know how to clean the straws properly without one. They've been lasting me for a while and if you make sure to clean them properly with the brush then they're great! I would buy these as a gift, especially because they're reducing single-use plastics!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get reusable straws for a long time, and found these ones for a great price. Decided to try them out, they are great! I find myself gravitating towards the straight ones more, but the curved ones are nice too. I'm so glad they came with a little brush so you can really clean them out! Great product, would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kell

customer_reviews.title: Lose the unnecessary bubble wrap and boxes Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Ok I love these but I knocked a star off because they came in SO much plastic. My reason for buying these was to cut my plastic use, and I think that was counteracted by the amount of packaging this small bag of straws came in.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella W

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly perfect
customer_reviews.text: The little straw shaped bottle brush is a game changer. This kit has everything you need to go straw-less ... you won’t even miss them!! They haven’t discolored or shown any wear. I haven’t bumped my teeth against it (one of my fears) and it doesn’t get too cold to drink when it’s an iced drink. It you have really really sensitive teeth I would probably recommend the silicon version.
customer_reviews.author: sky king

customer_reviews.title: Do away with plastic straws
customer_reviews.text: Great reusable straws for the big Yeti or Yeti-like tumblers. They even fit comfortably in the hole if you use a lid, such as. They're easy to wash and even come with 2 flexible straw brushes for cleaning the inside. Have been using these for 3 months and no problems with rust either.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Yay for no plastic!
customer_reviews.text: I made the switch out of plastic straws and am so happy with this purchase. I use one at work, keep one in the original plastic bag in my purse, and keep the rest at home for myself and guests. I love that they are sturdy and reusable and I don't have to waste money on plastic straws anymore that are bad for the environment anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Nice but pretty thin walled tubing
customer_reviews.text: Very thin walled tubing. Nice finish though. I recommend using rubber tips on these to prevent cutting your lip open. If you're using with a plastic cup, you might want to use a tip on the other end too so as to avoid gouging the bottom of your cup.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Nordin

customer_reviews.title: Let's keep plastic Out of the ocean.
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand " flavor " so I didn't star it?! For the only flavor you'll be tasting will be your smoothie. Comes with 2 cleaning brushes and a pouch to keep it in, think about changing the way you drink either drink from the cup or get this at a good cost. Mahalo, " thanks " from Honolulu Hawaii.
customer_reviews.author: Charlette A. P. Kealoha

customer_reviews.title: I want to know the stats on Steel straw caused injuries.
customer_reviews.text: I want to know the stats on Steel straw caused injuries and accidents. The straws are great for what they are. Great value when I bought them about 6 months ago. However, there is a learning curve to using them. They are weapon quality stainless steel. They have punctured my cups. They have stabbed me. They nearly chipped my tooth. But they do allow me to use low pressure to pull a liquid out of a cup and into my guts, which is what it needs to do. And I never throw them away. I prefer the straight ones.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph k. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: So great
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Feel great about being sustainable, helping the environment and reducing plastic waist from disposable plastic straws! As much as I want to do my part, you can’t deny that paper straws are a pain and often suck. Enter these metal wonders! These metal straws are substantial without feeling cumbersome in your drink. They are the right height for med/tall glasses. They have a good mouth-feel without a strong metal taste. Good for hot and cold. Also super easy to clean. Appreciate the product.
customer_reviews.author: More Shopping Please!

customer_reviews.title: Save the Planet, One Plastic Straw At A Time
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. We use these daily and give them a little scrub every few days with the brushes that came with them. You need to be careful when using metal straws and they take a while to get used to them. I don't advise walking and slurping as they don't bend like we are used to when using straws. You can injure your mouth if you are not careful. Save the planet and stop throwing plastic straws away!
customer_reviews.author: dstouten

customer_reviews.title: Super Cool and Environmentally Friendly!
customer_reviews.text: They are so nice and refined, I don't know if I'm a good enough person to deserve them. I really like the fact they they included TWO miniature cleaning brushes, for I will get so much use out of these straws, that I will surely wear the first one out will thousands of cleaning routines. A clean straw is a happy straw, and now I'll be sucking up my refreshments 8n style! Woo-Hoo! Ha ha ha ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Dudeboy 1959

customer_reviews.title: I like that these are washable and cut down in plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that these are washable and cut down in plastic waste. My kids love straws. These are verily long and very narrow. I wish they were a bit wider and not so tall. They stick out about 3 inches over the top of the large yeti cup. I am afraid I am going to impale myself in the middle of the night while taking a drink, lol. I prefer the curved to the straight. I’d still recommend though. They are sturdy and won’t melt if they fall between down to the heating element of the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Klo

customer_reviews.title: Best metal straws
customer_reviews.text: Recently switched to a plastic free home and these were a no brainer. I didn't have ANY metal taste and they are fairly easy to clean with the brush that is included. The bend straws are a little harder to clean because the brush doesn't bend but we use them everyday and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Kaileigh

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: These came as described. They are easy to clean and so far we haven’t noticed any strange tastes from the straws. We prefer the straight straws but it’s nice to have a variety. In hind sight we we could have purchased shorter straws but these work great in taller tumblers/cups. Overall very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Katie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful alternative to wasteful disposable straws, and amazing cleaning tool
customer_reviews.text: Love these straws! Just keep in mind: they get very cold when you're drinking a smoothie, and hot if you take them to the beach or something, but otherwise they are amazing. I LOVE the little brushes that come with it. I also use them to clean other straws i have at home from reusable sip-cups, and they are super easy to use. Would definitely recommend. I was so sad when i learned how bad straws are for the environment, but a friend pointed me to these reusable ones and I'm so grateful!
customer_reviews.author: Jupandor

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE! It's so though trying to go green and it's little things like this that make me happy. These straws are convenient. Save money. Don't waste plastic. I have a 4 year old so we always had straws on deck. This product is awesome. Please try it. Soak them in some soapy water and use the pipe cleaner to clean them out before using them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Vargas

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING STRAWS
customer_reviews.text: great straws, great price, couldnt ask for more! arrived super fast and i love the little pouch they come with so u can store them or take one or two out so u don't have to use plastic straws its perfect and they are very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Nour Z.

customer_reviews.title: Love Them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these stainless steel straws for my wife and she LOVES them! A cleaning brush is included with the set. Stop using plastic throw away straws and use these permanent stainless steel ones! The environment will love you.
customer_reviews.author: Mikaele

customer_reviews.title: They work well
customer_reviews.text: Many areas are doing away with plastic straws. These work well and are durable so that we can have a straw when one isn't provided. They are a little long but I place them in the bottom of my purse in a plastic bag. I do wish they had come with a sturdy bag to store them in.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I recieved my straws a couple of days ago but I love them already. Only thing is I did wash them first just in case. But I got a metal taste out of the straw i used. I'll still use it in any case. Also a bit hard to stop chewing regular plastic straws but I dont like the sound of my teeth touching the metal so helps stop.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian OT

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I definitely recommend this product to anyone who is serious about taking the steps to eliminate all single-use plastics from their daily lives. These straws are seriously awesome! Since there are 8, I can take them to restaurants with a group of friends and we can all use them. I would recommend getting a bag/holder for them though because if the bag that they come in breaks it might be difficult to carry them around loosely. They clean reallllly easily with the included brushes and don't have any kind of metallic taste when using!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUETLEY LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: I love these straws so much! They are easy to clean and use and I love the fact that help cut down on wasteful plastic straw use. I have considered purchasing more, but I would go with all bent ones for future purchases, just my preference though. I also really like the length of these straws they fit in all my tall tumblers and glasses! Great for any type of liquid beverage, but not the best for smoothies or milkshakes. Overall I love these!
customer_reviews.author: Korrine

customer_reviews.title: Better taste, plastic free? YAY!
customer_reviews.text: We need every family to have enough of these for their numbers. These are wonderful. Better than ever plastic straw we have every gotten with tumblers. And they are extremely easy to clean. Not only that, but our drinks TASTE better through them... never thought I'd say that before. But the flavor is better than that of plastic straws.
customer_reviews.author: JD and Cali

customer_reviews.title: Straws of Steel
customer_reviews.text: I love stainless steel straws and always get compliments from guests. I bought these for one of those guests and I loved the fact that they came in straight and bent. They were a lot longer than I thought they'd be. Mine are a couple inches shorter and they work well for my glasses. Hopefully our friends glasses are a little taller!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Smith

product_meta.title: YIHONG Set of 8 Reusable Stainless Steel Metal Straws- Ultra Long 10.5 Inch- Regular Size 6 mm Wide - 30oz Tumblers Compatible - 4 Straight+ 4 Bent+ 2 Brushes+ 1 Pouch
feature_bullets: Set of 8pcs Stainless Steel Straws,10.5 inch Extra Long metal straws fit your 30oz stainless tumbler,compatible with most popular brands including Yeti, Rtic, Bubba, Ozark, Klean Kanteen and Tervis.

With Outer Diameter of 0.25inch(6mm),perfect suit liquid drinks like water, cocktail,coffee,ice tea,cappuccino,and which is not suitable for thicker drinks like milkshakes,smoothies, coffee,yogurt etc.
Made of food-grade 18/8 stainless steel, no metal aftertaste,plastic free, BPA free, dishwasher safe,easy to clean.

One more step closer to an eco-friendly lifestyle and cuts the disposable straws use in a convenient way.As a green alternative to plastic,safer for the environment,and which reduce white pollution and protect the ocean.
Modern and sleek stainless straws add fun to any party, trendy for family reunion,girl's night out,cocktail party,Patio BBQ,picnics,boating and more! Great gift choice for your families and friends.
